[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Fee Accrual] Does the value calculation account for fees accrued to the position since last collection, or are fees only counted when collected? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: update_momentum_position_value()] [Position Ownership Change] If position ownership transfers from vault between borrowing and value update, will the update still succeed and corrupt vault accounting? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Zero Price Oracle] If oracle returns price_a = 0 or price_b = 0 (stablecoin depeg, oracle failure), will this cause division by zero or zero valuation? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Extreme Price Ratios] If price_a/price_b ratio is > u256::MAX or < 1, will relative_price_from_oracle calculation overflow/underflow? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Zero Sqrt Price] If sqrt_price_x64 = 0 (invalid pool state), will the function return 0 price and pass slippage checks incorrectly? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Max Sqrt Price] For sqrt_price_x64 = u128::MAX, will the squaring operation overflow u256? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_token_amounts()] [Zero Tick Range] If lower_tick = upper_tick (zero-width range), will liquidity_math return zero amounts or cause errors? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_token_amounts()] [Full Range Position] For tick range covering all possible ticks (min to max), can amount calculations overflow? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_token_amounts()] [MMT v3 Liquidity Math Bug] If mmt_v3::liquidity_math::get_amounts_for_liquidity has bugs or returns incorrect values, will this propagate to vault value calculations? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_token_amounts()] [Tick Math Precision] If mmt_v3::tick_math::get_sqrt_price_at_tick loses precision for extreme ticks, will amount calculations be incorrect? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Vault Oracle Module Changes] If vault_oracle module changes its price format or decimal handling, will this adaptor break without updates? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Vault Utils Mul Error] Can vault_utils::mul_with_oracle_price overflow, underflow, or lose precision in ways that corrupt value_a/value_b calculations? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: update_momentum_position_value()] [DoS via Invalid Pool] Can an attacker create a malicious MomentumPool that causes update_momentum_position_value to always revert, preventing value updates? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [DoS via Slippage] Can an attacker manipulate pool prices to be outside slippage bounds before legitimate value updates, causing ERR_INVALID_POOL_PRICE and preventing updates? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Gas Exhaustion] For positions with extreme parameters, can the calculations (especially pow, sqrt, mul) consume excessive gas, making updates too expensive? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: All Functions] [Oracle Call Griefing] If vault_oracle::get_asset_price is expensive or can be made to fail by attackers, can this DoS value updates? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Constants: DECIMAL, SLIPPAGE_BASE] [Constant Modification] Are DECIMAL and SLIPPAGE_BASE truly immutable constants, or can they be modified by admin/upgrade, potentially breaking all calculations? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Constant: ERR_INVALID_POOL_PRICE] [Error Code Collision] Does error code 7_001 collide with other error codes in the system, causing confusion in error handling? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Slippage Config Bounds] Does OracleConfig validate that dex_slippage() returns values <= SLIPPAGE_BASE, or can out-of-bounds values cause incorrect checks? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Module Upgrade] [State Migration] If this adaptor is upgraded with new logic, how are existing position values migrated, and can old values become incorrect under new calculations? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Module Upgrade] [MMT v3 Version Incompatibility] If mmt_v3 module upgrades with breaking changes to Pool/Position structure, will this adaptor break or produce incorrect results? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Module Upgrade] [Oracle Config Evolution] If OracleConfig adds new price sources or changes decimal handling, does this adaptor remain compatible? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Systematic Rounding Bias] Do all division operations consistently round in the same direction (up/down), causing systematic over/undervaluation accumulating across positions? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: sqrt_price_x64_to_price()] [Fixed Point Precision Loss] Converting from Q64.64 to 18-decimal format involves multiple divisions - can accumulated precision loss exceed 1%? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/adaptors/momentum.adaptor.move] [Function: get_position_value()] [Small Position Dust] For positions with very small liquidity, can amount calculations round to zero while actual value exists? (Low)
